Reviews.Title: Simple Door Lock Install
Reviews.Author: smiley
Reviews.Content: This significantly simplified the keyless entry install. Plugs directly into my viper 5701 and using 1 resistor I was able to wire it up to a mazda 3. This allows the viper 5701 to unlock all doors as if it was pressing the unlock on the doors lock/unlock button. I highly recommend this over the two relay install because it comes with all the wires preattached, resistor pack, and in a smaller footprint.If you're looking for driver door priority unlock, then you need a different solution than this. This device is only for unlocking all doors or locking all doors.

Reviews.Title: make my day easier
Reviews.Author: M.Xiong
Reviews.Content: nice product easy to install and use for all door lock actuator... is a must have no more relay lying underneath the dash... great product as stated... Thanks

Reviews.Title: This Lock Module makes for less wiring and a shorter project time.
Reviews.Author: Smmaxxx
Reviews.Content: This lock module works great for my needs and it makes wiring it up easier than two separate relays.  It also takes up less room and is still working great after 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Rainwater
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that I was able to intigrate it with relative ease into the Viper system I installed into my 2010 Ford Ranger. The polarity is reversed on the ford door lock system so you will have to hook them up in reverse order. Splice, check then solder. I was able to make all my connections at the fuse panel. Butt connectors are o.k. but you cant beat solder or a good connection.

Reviews.Title: Compact and Works
Reviews.Author: josh "jtd"
Reviews.Content: Basically a two relay lock setup in a small box, works just like two independent relays but is far more compact and has a nice clean professional look. used a few of these and haven't had one fail yet, my go-to lock setup.

Reviews.Title: Great mod
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I originally wanted to setup a double relay but found this.  Amazingly small and does what a double relay setup is suppose to do, tucked it away.

Reviews.Title: Makes install a snap!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Lackey
Reviews.Content: I have used these relays for many years and never had a problem with them. Makes install easy when hooking up to a Viper alarm. would recommend this for anyone who is doing door actuators.

Reviews.Title: save me the time
Reviews.Author: Min
Reviews.Content: why try to connect a bunch of relays when you can get this? this works perfect with my car alarm Viper responder 350 (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00445TG52/ref=oh_details_o05_s01_i00?ie=UTF8&psc;=1). it came with a varietly of resistors so i didnt have to worry about hunting down for those at my local electronics store.note that there are no duplicate resistors. most likely you will use one or two from the whole package. So be careful not to mess it up with the soldering.i save a lot of time by using this.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and works great!
Reviews.Author: Rich Holm
Reviews.Content: Pair this up with some door actuators for my 1999 Civic. Was extremely easy to add onto my Viper alarm and would do it again if I needed to install an alarm in another vehicle.

ProductInfo.Features:
Re-wired door lock relay assembly that comes with resistors for some new-model vehicles
Compatible with most Directed Electronics systmes
Compatible with most Directed Electronics systems
Door Lock Relay Module
ProductInfo.Name: Install Essentials 451M Dooor Lock Relay Module
